txt.en: Târsh maintained order among the forces of the White Hand, until you put an end to him.
Chief Warrior Thurgtârk was the greatest of the warriors under Llygad's command... now he is food for the worms.
Defeat the leaders of the invasion of the School at Tham Mírdain.
Llygad the Blade was a cruel taskmaster sent with his Dunlending kinsmen to Tham Mírdain to secure the Forge.
